findings.message:
Reentrancy in THORChain_Router.deposit(address,address,uint256,string) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#46-61):
	External calls:
	- safeAmount = safeTransferFrom(asset,amount) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#57)
		- (success,data) = _asset.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(0x23b872dd,msg.sender,address(this),_amount)) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#122)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- vaultAllowance[vault][asset] += safeAmount (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#58)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in THORChain_Router.transferOut(address,address,uint256,string) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#78-90):
	External calls:
	- (success,data) = to.call{value: msg.value}() (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#82)
	- (success,data) = asset.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(0xa9059cbb,to,amount)) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#85)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success,data) = to.call{value: msg.value}() (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#82)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TransferOut(msg.sender,to,asset,safeAmount,memo) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#89)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in THORChain_Router.deposit(address,address,uint256,string) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#46-61):
	External calls:
	- (success,data) = vault.call{value: safeAmount}() (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#50)
	- iRUNE(RUNE).transferTo(address(this),amount) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#54)
	- iERC20(RUNE).burn(amount) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#55)
	- safeAmount = safeTransferFrom(asset,amount) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#57)
		- (success,data) = _asset.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(0x23b872dd,msg.sender,address(this),_amount)) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#122)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success,data) = vault.call{value: safeAmount}() (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#50)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Deposit(vault,asset,safeAmount,memo) (../..0x42a5ed456650a09dc10ebc6361a7480fdd61f27b.sol#60)
findings.name: reentrancy-events
